statements: SELECT * FROM employee_database;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employee_database;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role, responsibilities FROM employee_database ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_role FROM employee_database WHERE employee_role='Manager';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, performance_review FROM employee_database WHERE performance_review IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM employee_database WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employee_database WHERE employee_id = 5;
SELECT employee_name, performance_review FROM employee_database WHERE responsibilities LIKE '%Manage%';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, responsibilities FROM employee_database WHERE employee_role = 'Team Lead' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_database WHERE performance_review IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeRoles;
SELECT employee_id, role_name FROM EmployeeRoles WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceReviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT review_id, rating, feedback FROM PerformanceReviews WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT role_name, responsibilities FROM EmployeeRoles WHERE role_name LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeRoles WHERE role_name = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, role_name FROM EmployeeRoles WHERE employee_id < 100 ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT review_id, rating FROM PerformanceReviews WHERE review_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, MAX(rating) AS max_rating FROM PerformanceReviews GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT role_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM EmployeeRoles GROUP BY role_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_roles;
SELECT role_title, department FROM employee_roles WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, role_title, department, salary FROM employee_roles ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT employee_id, responsibility_title, priority FROM employee_responsibilities WHERE deadline > '2023-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, review_date, performance_rating, reviewer_name FROM employee_reviews WHERE performance_rating < 3 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_roles WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC
SELECT department, AVG(salary) AS avg_salary FROM employee_roles GROUP BY department
SELECT e.role_title, r.responsibility_title FROM employee_roles e JOIN employee_responsibilities r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id
SELECT * FROM employee_reviews WHERE performance_rating >= 4 AND review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT review_date, reviewer_name FROM employee_reviews ORDER BY review_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_email, hire_date FROM Employees;
SELECT role_name, department FROM EmployeeRoles;
SELECT review_id, review_date, review_notes FROM EmployeePerformanceReviews;
SELECT responsibility_id, responsibility_description FROM EmployeeResponsibilities;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeRoles;
SELECT role_name, department FROM EmployeeRoles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date, role_name FROM Employees JOIN EmployeeRoles ON Employees.role_id = EmployeeRoles.role_id;
SELECT employee_name, review_date, review_notes FROM Employees JOIN EmployeePerformanceReviews ON Employees.employee_id = EmployeePerformanceReviews.employee_id;
SELECT role_name, COUNT(*) FROM Employees JOIN EmployeeRoles ON Employees.role_id = EmployeeRoles.role_id GROUP BY role_name;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, role, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT review_id, review_date, rating, comments FROM performance_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT role_name, responsibilities FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, role FROM employees ORDER BY role DESC;

SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM employees INNER JOIN employees_departments ON employees.employee_id = employees_departments.employee_id WHERE employees_departments.department_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, responsibilities FROM roles WHERE role_id IN (1,3,5) ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, review_date, rating FROM performance_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
